Class AbstractHierarchyPanelController

  • java.lang.Object

  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    com.oracle.javafx.scenebuilder.kit.editor.panel.hierarchy.treeview.HierarchyTreeViewController

    public abstract class AbstractHierarchyPanelController
extends com.oracle.javafx.scenebuilder.kit.editor.panel.util.AbstractFxmlPanelController
    This class creates and controls the Hierarchy Panel of Scene Builder Kit.

      • fxomDocumentDidChange

        protected void fxomDocumentDidChange(com.oracle.javafx.scenebuilder.kit.fxom.FXOMDocument oldDocument)
        Description copied from class: com.oracle.javafx.scenebuilder.kit.editor.panel.util.AbstractPanelController
        Updates the panel after the editor controller has change the base document. Subclass can use EditorController.getFxomDocument() to retrieve the newly set document (possibly null).
        Specified by:
        fxomDocumentDidChange in class com.oracle.javafx.scenebuilder.kit.editor.panel.util.AbstractPanelController
        Parameters:
        oldDocument - the previous document (possibly null).
